summary: This bill, the "Shielding Children's Retinas from Egregious Exposure on the Net Act" (SCREEN Act) aims to protect minors from online pornography. It mandates that interactive computer services providing pornographic content implement technology verification measures to verify user age and prevent minors from accessing harmful content. The Federal Trade Commission (FTC) is tasked with enforcement, including audits of platforms and guidance for compliance. The bill also includes data security requirements and a GAO report to assess the effectiveness and impact of the measures.
